message: Let's start fair. You get a little something, and I'll take the bulk. Hope you agree!
I'm not greedy, but I think I deserve more than 1/3. What do you say?
Okay, let's try this. I'm willing to give you a good share, but I need to make sure I get enough to keep up with inflation.  What do you think?
I'm starting to think we're not on the same page. I'll give you a slight edge, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of.
